name: Roggen-Weizen
description:
Störtebeker Roggen-Weizen is a robust dark wheat beer, known for its creamy body and a blend of vanilla and fruit aromas that tantalize the palate. It's unfiltered, top-fermented and made from rye and wheat, which contributes to its rich, chestnut brown color and full-bodied taste. The combination of rye, wheat, roasted, and caramel malts provide a deep hue and a velvety texture, while a light hopping with the Emerald variety allows the vanilla and red fruit aromas to fully unfold​​​​.

This beer has been recognized for its excellence, notably being awarded as the best dark wheat beer in 2014. It's described as having a flavor profile that includes banana, clove, caramel, and spicy yeast, all contributing to a complex and satisfying taste experience​​​​. Served at a temperature of around 16°C to best enjoy its flavors.
